Title: Roses from Qajar Iran
Brief Description: Middle East, Ceramic, Tile; Tile, glazed earthenware, central medallion design of rose bouquet on white ground, with corner designs of yellow scrollwork on blue ground, Tehran or Shiraz, Iran, 1850-1870
Materials and Techniques: Buff-coloured earthenware, tin-opacified white slip, polychrome painted in turquoise, pink, purple, green, blue and yellow with manganese black outlines, glazed
